actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar
Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations requiring that a determination of the number of separate persons for purposes of payments under annual farm programs be made within 45 days of approval by a county committee of any such person's application to participation in a farm program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations requiring that a determination of the number of separate persons for purposes of farm program payments be made within 45 days of approval by a county committee of any such person's farm program application. Prohibits redeterminations of the number of separate persons except in cases of fraud or substantial noncompliance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations requiring that a determination of the number of separate persons for purposes of payments under annual farm programs be made within 45 days of approval by a county committee of any such person's application to participation in a farm program, and for other purposes.
